name: NoteTaker
description: A quick EM that allows comments to be added to a single notes field, formatted with user and timestamp.

project-settings.name:
Note Taker Instructions

Each block for notes requires three fields be configured

sub_settings.name:
Event id where the data is located
Must include both source and destination fields

Input Field (either 'text' or 'textarea' field)
This field's value will be added to the designated note field upon record save.

Date Field (must be validated as date or date/time)
This field's value will be populated with the current time & date upon record save (useful for report filters)

Note Field (either 'text' or 'textarea' field)
This field's value will be all previous notes prepended with the input field's value upon record save.
NOTE: You will also need a field to display the piped results.

Include New Line after detail
If checked, the note will start on a new line as opposed to right after the current timestamp

Include a delimiter
If expecting longer input, you might want to add a delimiter between entries

project-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger

system-settings.name: Enable Debug Logging (system-wide)(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger
